note:
Sister tyrannosaurus! Gnome wrangler extraordinaire. Deaf/Hard of Hearing mom of a sassy 5yr old. Nerds raising nerds to be good humans. Coloradoan sense of direction. The mountains are west.

Love eclectic funky finds, upcycled things, memes, science, games, pop culture and good stories. Currently work retail supply chain, but dreamed of environmental science and politics before health got in the way. Banned from one local Mom Group for calling out MLM-peddling racist antivaxxers. Worth it.
